mapper.select: SELECT MAX(id) AS id, DATE_TRUNC('hour', measured_at) AS measuredAt, AVG(temperature_c) AS temperature_c FROM air_temperatures GROUP BY measuredAt ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pagination.size} OFFSET #{pagination.skip};
SELECT id , temperature_c , measured_at AS measured_at FROM air_temperatures WHERE (measured_at)::date = CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pagination.size} OFFSET #{pagination.skip};
